page.title: 15Shopping Survey, Curdridge.
page.content: As there is only one shop in Curdridge apart from farm produce shops, and a garage shop, we asked the parents of Curdridge Primary School where they did their main shopping, and their local shopping. Here are the results: {MAIN SHOPPING} BURSLEDON XXXXXXXXXXXXXXX BITTERNE XXX LOCKSHEATH X FAREHAM XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX EASTLEIGH XXX HEDGE END XXX PORTSMOUTH X HAVANT X WINCHESTER X { {LOCAL SHOPPING} The most popular places for local shopping were{Bishops Waltham, Hedge {End and Botley.}
